root.name: Hexen: Deathkings of the Dark Citadel
root.description: Where HeXen Ends, the True Nightmare Begins. Deathkings of the Dark Citadel is the only official expansion of the original HeXen game. This add-on pack features 20 new single player levels from the original HeXen team as well as a host of new multiplayer options. System Requirements Minimum: A 100% Windows 2000/XP/Vista-compatible computer system
